Docs.summary: Provides objects for each state of the **Close** button of a small window. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Each property of the VisualStyleElement.Window.SmallCloseButton class returns a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> for a different state of the **Close** button of a small window, such as a tool window.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Window.SmallCloseButton.Normal%2A> property. To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form. Handle the form’s <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call the `DrawVisualStyleElementWindowSmallCloseButton1` method from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
